page.title: Daydream VR
page.content: 시간    09am~12pm        접속    https://codelabs.developers.google.com/            진행         Interacting with the Daydream Controller Touchpad     Displaying Video and UI in Daydream                 Interacting with the Daydream Controller Touchpad    What you'll learn         Create a new Unity project that uses the Google VR Unity SDK.     How to import the Google VR Unity SDK package.     How to adjust the build settings to target Daydream devices.     Deploy a Daydream app onto a device.     Create a bow and arrow like interface to fire objects into the scene using the touchpad.     Attach objects to the users hand using provided prefabs that read the accelerometers.     How to read data from the Daydream controller using the Google VR Unity SDK.            다운로드         Unity     https://store.unity.com/download/thank-you?thank-you&os=osx&nid=330     설치 시 'Android Build Support' 체크 필수￼Manual : https://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/￼경로 보는 법           Windows - %LocalAppData%\Android\sdk      Mac - ~/Library/Android/sdk (Note, if you don't see your Library folder in users, try pressing Command+Shift+. to toggle visibility of system files).          Android Studio￼https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html￼https://developer.android.com/studio/install.html     Google VR SDK￼https://github.com/googlevr/gvr-unity-sdk/releases        Important: If this is your first time building in Unity, you may be prompted to locate the Android SDK folder. If you installed the SDK to its default location, it can be found at the following locations:
page.html:
시간

09am~12pm


접속

https://codelabs.developers.google.com/


진행

  1. Interacting with the Daydream Controller Touchpad
  2. Displaying Video and UI in Daydream

Interacting with the Daydream Controller Touchpad

What you'll learn

  • Create a new Unity project that uses the Google VR Unity SDK.
  • How to import the Google VR Unity SDK package.
  • How to adjust the build settings to target Daydream devices.
  • Deploy a Daydream app onto a device.
  • Create a bow and arrow like interface to fire objects into the scene using the touchpad.
  • Attach objects to the users hand using provided prefabs that read the accelerometers.
  • How to read data from the Daydream controller using the Google VR Unity SDK.

다운로드

  1. Unity

    2. https://store.unity.com/download/thank-you?thank-you&os=osx&nid=330

    설치 시 'Android Build Support' 체크 필수￼Manual : https://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/￼경로 보는 법

    • Windows - %LocalAppData%\Android\sdk
    • Mac - ~/Library/Android/sdk (Note, if you don't see your Library folder in users, try pressing Command+Shift+. to toggle visibility of system files).
  2. Android Studio￼https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html￼https://developer.android.com/studio/install.html
  3. Google VR SDK￼https://github.com/googlevr/gvr-unity-sdk/releases

Important: If this is your first time building in Unity, you may be prompted to locate the Android SDK folder. If you installed the SDK to its default location, it can be found at the following locations:
